author: Joshua Caplan, Joshua Caplan
title: Bill O’Reilly: Many Dead Coronavirus Victims ‘Were on Their Last Legs'
description: Former Fox News Channel host Bill O’Reilly said Wednesday that many of those who died from the Chinese coronavirus "were on their last legs anyways."
content:
Former Fox News Channel host Bill OReilly said Wednesday that many of those who died from the Chinese coronavirus “were on their last legs anyways.”
OReilly, who departed Fox News in 2017 following persistent sexual harassment allegations, made the remark as… [+2301 chars]
